content.description: Start 10' left of the right oak tree, below the right end of the roof 15' up. Climb the right side of white face then pass three roofs on the right.
content.protection: sling the big protruding block at top

content.description: Start from halfway up Chewy's Chimney, at the base of the chimney itself. Climb the steep face a few feet to the left of the arete and follow the nice finger and hand crack to the top.
content.protection: sling the block at the top of Venus buttress
content.location: downclimb or rappel Chewy's Chimney to the base

content.description: start 4' right of the coffee table size block at base. Climb the blocky shallow dihedral then climb diagonally left to top of buttress.

climbs.name: Peace Will Guide the Planets
climbs.fa: Ben LaCour and David Carrier, May 2020

content.description: Start a few feet right of an oak tree, under the left edge of the roof about 15' up. Climb the white face on small ledges and crimps. Go left of three roofs and directly up through chimney at top.
content.protection: sling the big protruding block at top.

climbs.name: Our Solemn Hour
climbs.fa: Mark "Indy" Kochte, Jeffrey Lash, Brendan Cathcart, Sept. 2014

content.description: start about 6' right of the left end of the face and climb straight up the white face on easy blocks and ledges directly to top
Start a few feet right of Our Solemn Hour and climb directly up the white face to a bushy tree, then follow the buttress to the top.
content.protection: sling the big protruding block at the top.

content.description: Climb Chewy's Chimney to the big ledge halfway up. Climb up the white rock to the far right of Chewy's Chimney and climb the white face directly to the top of the buttress.
content.protection: sling the big block at the top
content.location: downclimb or rappel Chewy's Chimney to base.

climbs.name: Love Will Steer the Stars
climbs.fa: David Carrier and Ben LaCour, May 2020

content.description: Start at left end of the face next to the blocky boulder at the base. Climb straight up the left edge of the arete.
content.protection: sling the big block on top

climbs.name: Forbidden Planet
climbs.fa: Ben LaCour and David Carrier, May 2020

content.description: Climb up to the big ledge halfway up Chewy's Chimney and scoot across the small ledge to the right of the sapling. Climb straight up the steep face a few feet right of the sapling.
content.protection: sling big block on top of Venus buttress
content.location: Downclimb or rappel Chewy's Chimney to base

content.description: Start at the big ledge halfway up Chewy's Chimney and scoot across the small ledge to the right of the tree sapling. Head straight up the edge of the arete to the top.
content.protection: sling the block at the top of Venus buttress

content.description: Start directly below the roof 15' up and climb over the center of the roof. Climb up and over the second roof and directly to the top.
content.protection: sling the big protruding block at the top.

content.description: Far left side of buttress- climb up and over big ledges to a fork halfway up the route. Follow the left fork up to the top of Earth buttress or the right fork to the top of Venus buttress. This route can be downclimbed or rappelled to reach the base of Mercury, Venus, Earth, and Mars buttresses.
content.protection: sling the table-size block at the top of Venus buttress and hang a static line to the base to assist with climbing up and down the route.
content.location: downclimb or rappel the obvious chimney north and east of Venus buttress

content.description: Second buttress north of Moonshine buttress. This area is north of falcon closure area.
